字幕内容: let this subject take a look at your hand.
Qi Yan: If this is left untreated
it will become a bruise overnight.
That will hurt for many days more.
Qi Yan: Bear with it for just a moment
It’ll be alright once it is kneaded out.
Qi Yan: Hold on just a bit more
Qi Yan: Your Highness isn’t mad anymore.
Nangong Jingnu: Who said I was mad.

字幕颜色: this subject does not wish for you to ever suffer mistreatment.

字幕内容: Though this subject’s meager status give such words little weight
this subject will still spare no efforts to protect Your Highness.
I want to return to the estate.
Qi Yan: Will Your Highness play a game with this subject?

字幕颜色: whenever Your Highness wins against this subject in a game of chess

字幕内容: this subject will promise you one thing.
Qi Yan: Anything that does not go against the way of gentlemen.

字幕颜色: this subject can’t be made to die either.

字幕内容: Nangong Jingnu: Who would make you do something like that?
Nangong Jingnu: Leaving the estate in disguise
Qi Yan: What makes you say that
Nangong Jingnu: You’re clearly aware that I’m not good at…

字幕颜色: that I’m an amateur in chess.

字幕内容: You’re just trying to fool me with empty words!
this subject will let Your Highness put two stones first
Qi Yan: What about… three stones?
Qi Yan: Well then… four stones
A clap to seal the deal!
Whenever I win from now on
you have to accompany me out of the estate
and you can’t tell Emperor Father about it!
